Name: I Kriti
Review Text: Great Greek taverna, lovely atmosphere, nice classic Greek songs, nice raki and great taverna food, must go!

Name: I Kriti
Review Text: Best Greek food I've been able to find in Amsterdam! This place is run by a Greek man who is always around and sometimes he plays Greek songs on his guitar. If you like greek food and culture, you should try this place.

Name: I Kriti
Review Text: Great! Came and was empty but the food was great! They took good care of it! Very attentive and delicious food!

Name: I Kriti
Review Text:
Perhaps we were here on an off night and our group of 15 was loo large to to handle?
Yes the place has a nice local family vibe and the owner and his wife are very …

Name: I Kriti
Review Text: Small family business with a true touch. Happy to found a place! Be back.

Name: I Kriti
Review Text: My Greek dad gave it 2 thumbs up. The food is as authentic as it gets, and the couple who own the restaurant are super nice. The owner started playing his guitar and singing Greek songs at the end of the night. A true Greek experience.

Name: I Kriti
Review Text: Very nice and supposedly authentic Greek restaurant. SUPER nice owner, who likes to drink some and then play his guitar and sings Greek songs in front of everyone. It's quite the experience. However, if you are looking for something fancy …

Name: I Kriti
Review Text: The best greek food in Amsterdam. Incredible taste. After finishing eating you will still have the great taste remained in your mouth and mind. We had greek salad, calamari(squaid), fries, tzatziki, pita, vegan mousaka and icecream. Great price for 2, 48 euro.

Name: I Kriti
Review Text: Nice little greek rest in quiet neighborhood. Good homemade food for greek expats so taste is genuine. Been there twice in different trips to Amsterdam. Same nice and kind of warm family service.

Name: I Kriti
Review Text: Warm and fuzzy. Decor, vibe, food quality is a poor comparison of the Greek / Cretan experience. Even the menu was wrong: baked zucchini was served fried. Bad value for the food you get (read, rip off). Sorry not sorry.

Name: I Kriti
Review Text: It was very lovely when the owner sang and played Greek music. Sadly the food was not as joyfull as the music. It was very plain and not comparable with what you can  actually have in Greece

Name: I Kriti
Review Text: Good and cozy restaurant. Mr. Giannis and his wife run the place, they take good care of the customer. There is always a bottle of tap water on the table and they offer nice portions of Greek food.

Name: I Kriti
Review Text: one word ent my opinion it's so so ellitl : first try meet the owner from this tavern .it's one person with diamond heart : is Rare person: in my life I meet much people . but Rare heart's it's definitely defecol find : I don't know what …

Name: I Kriti
Review Text: Very good service from very good people and excellent boss and play by him self live music

Name: I Kriti
Review Text: Excellent food, living room atmosphere however the seats are quite uncomfortable and the prices are just a bit too much in comparison with the whole experience. Would give it a 3.5

Name: I Kriti
Review Text: Great food with flavors I never had before in a Greek restaurant. Maybe because the chef is from Krete? Friendly staff.

Name: I Kriti
Review Text: 2 stars for the food. Seemed like the mousakka was heated in the microwave. The last stars for the warm and welcoming service and atmosphere.

Name: I Kriti
Review Text:
A cute little hidden gem in Amsterdam. It’s a very nice and authentic Greek restaurant. Especially the service convinced us :)
5/5 well deserved!

Name: I Kriti
Review Text: Very small and old Greek restaurant. With an amazing owner that can sing at your table. Good food.

Name: I Kriti
Review Text: Delicious and traditional Greek food. Lovely place and nice personell. Absolutely a must go

Name: I Kriti
Review Text: Amazing experience! The food is really good, the people and the owner so friendly and positive. I would strongly recommend this place to have a good time :)

Name: I Kriti
Review Text: Super tasty food at a great price. The house red wine is excellent with the authentic Crete rabbit dish

Name: I Kriti
Review Text: Great atmosphere, amazing people and very good food. A traditional greek tavern in the middle of amsterdam.

Name: I Kriti
Review Text: Loved the food and the atmosphere of the place. It feels like a Cretan oasis, and the owner of the place is always there in good spirits, chatting with customers and singing.

Name: I Kriti
Review Text: That was quite an experience: we were the last visitors, so owner (also cook) spent time with us. Food was nice and experience was very positive

Name: I Kriti
Review Text: Great restaurant where you can enjoy authentic Greek food from Crete! The hosts, Patricia and Yannis are very friendly and highly service oriented!

Name: I Kriti
Review Text: Great hospitality and great Greek food. Very affordable and small but definitely worth a visit!

Name: I Kriti
Review Text: Very good authentic Cretan kitchen and hospitality

Name: I Kriti
Review Text: Delicious food, extremely friendly owner! Cozy and Griek style place in Amsterdam!

Name: I Kriti
Review Text: One of the friendliest restaurants in town, this small place makes you feel in Greece/Krete for the night, olive oil till the gates of heaven, friendly priced, very much recommended!

Name: I Kriti
Review Text: Authentic Greek food (coming from a Greek) and great hospitality, will definitely go back.

Name: I Kriti
Review Text: Very nice food, atmosphere & people! We had a very good time!

Name: I Kriti
Review Text: Great authentic and friendly restaurant with nice live music. Tasty food too.

Name: I Kriti
Review Text: Great Greek food. We luckily caught the discount Monday to Wednesday menu.

Name: I Kriti
Review Text: Really nice, all the dishes we had were absolutely delicious.

Name: I Kriti
Review Text: Wonderful Greek establishment with a friendly staff and tasty food.

Name: I Kriti
Review Text: Very friendly, nice people and the food is more than fantastic  first time here but not the last

Name: I Kriti
Review Text: A cozy small restaurant. Food is tasty and the owner is very friendly

Name: I Kriti
Review Text: Amazing cosy restaurant, feels like a trip to Greece!

Name: I Kriti
Review Text: Lovely place, very welcoming and food was amazing.....

Name: I Kriti
Review Text: Sweet place, family atmosphere ♡ good food

Name: I Kriti
Review Text: Traditional, great music, good food, good service.

Name: I Kriti
Review Text: It's different but nice. Interesting music. Friendly and helpful staff :)
